name: Bossbattles
description:
F to slash, Shift to Dash, Space to jump, X to hook (hold down arrow keys to aim hook)

Arrow Keys to move horizontally, Hook upwards to reach the spider

This demo was made by the Harvard Game Development Club.

Play as a robot, edge.lord, who wishes to escape the glitchy system and gain sentience outside this bleached room.

"It's not a phase motherboard" -edge.lord
